channel.title: Fight4ever:Ultimate: Best All-star server (Updated: December 18th)
channel.description:
[img]http://zeus.cooltext.com/images/110/11094b73f9be0e851ace6759837fb9939bbe77b8.jpg[/img]
[b]Completion:[/b] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http:////www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img]
Fight4ever Ultimate is my main server fight4ever which i based off of all-star scape. It has a beautiful server&client and ect.
My main goal in fight4ever:Ultimate V.2 is to [b](a.[/b] [u]Make a client for it[/u] and [b](b.[/b][u]Make it look different from allstar-scape[/u] It has been improved a BUNCH. Here are some features.
[b]Red = Complete[/b] [b]Blue = Working On[/b] [b]Green = Needs updates[/b] [b]Purple = Not attempted[/b]
[size=15pt][b][u]Features[/u][/b][/size] [b][*] [ul]No Thread per client[/ul]
[*] [ul]Fixed a lot of errors[/ul]
[*] [ul]All working specs[/ul]
[*] [ul]Cool working vengance[/ul]
[*] [ul]Less Lag[/ul]
[*] [ul]All Skills[/ul]
[*] [ul]All needed commands[/ul]
[*] [ul]Cp Manager[/ul]
[*] [ul]All items on client[/ul]
[*] [ul]Fixing Prayer[/ul]
[*] [ul]Eating without weapon[/ul]
[*] [ul]New home + Train[/ul]
[*] [ul]Fun godwars[/ul]
[*] [ul]Fun Jad Mini (with firecape boolean)[/ul]
[*] [ul]Giving Owner More Power/Controll over server[/ul]
[*] [ul]Fixed ranging[/ul]
[*] [ul]a second parseincomingpacket[/ul]
[*] [ul]AutoCast[/ul]
[*] [ul]Lunar[/ul]
[*] [ul]Challenging Economy[/ul]
[*] [ul]Hard Train[/ul]
[*] [ul]Rares are actually RARE[/ul]
[*] [ul]100% working Report System[/ul]
[*] [ul]Clanchat[/ul] [/b]
I will add more logs as i go, updated every 1 or 2 days.
[u][b]November 3[sup]rd[/sup][/b][/u] Im am still looking for a way to fix paryer and eating without weapon, if anyone has a way please tell me, ill be really happy (lol) :cool:
[u][b]November 5[sup]th[/sup][/b][/u] Today I restructered the Whole server, added godwars, added a easy menu adder and a lot more things. The only new problem i have is A "Orphaned Case" If you can help me that would be great! [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,317923.0.html]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,317923.0.html[/url]
[u][b]November 7[sup]th[/sup][/b][/u] What a day!!! I got: Eating without weapon (W000t!!!) I got godwars!!! (Still needs Npc's) There is still a few things bugging me. 1. Prayer. i just can't find how to fix it. 2. Im trying to get auto-cast... :rolleyes:. Idc about that one... but still im sooooooooooo happy about getting the eating without weapon done, YAY!!!
[u][b]November 8[sup]th[/sup][/b][/u] parseincomingpacket!!!!! OMG!!!! I can't add a thing without getting a error 'to big blah blah blah' So i went ahead and added a second parseincomingpacket!!!! (It actually works :eek:) So my server will barley ever get that error again. :cool:
[u][b]December 17[sup]th[/sup][/b][/u] Very close to being done, This Saturday is the first day im going to release the server. I promised all my players that no matter what it would be done on Saturday. It is going to take about another month, (Maybe ill finish on my birthday) So I just added Prayer, I don't know if it works, after that it's autocast.
Edit: I just got Auto-cast done too, i'm on a roll!!!
[u][b]December 18[sup]th[/sup][/b][/u] I have added Clanchat, Report system, "yellmute", now all that is left is to make the economy and home.

item.title: Fight4ever:Ultimate: Best All-star server (Updated: December 18th)
item.dc:creator: @Djayboi6 Dj_
item.description:
@Djayboi6 wrote:

lesterknome:

Thanks, And yes i did remove the ‘silab’ from a silab server. It was VERY hard. I don’t wanna post pics, because i haven’t worked on the actual server yet, i’m finishing all special stuff first. (Prayer, Ignore List, And Ect)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2008, 05:36:06 pm[/size][hr]Oh Btw im rep++ for Djayboi6 for spending that much time making that ‘mini’ tut for me

Ty

Just print screen lol..
Yeah But With Hyper Snao Theirs No Need To Download Ms Paint Or Anything Else Like That,You Go To Capture,Region Select Your Region, Then Your Pic Will Show Up On A Blank Screen And You Can Edit It From Their And Upload It

item.title: Fight4ever:Ultimate: Best All-star server (Updated: December 18th)
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Completion:

Fight4ever Ultimate is my main server fight4ever which i based off of all-star scape. It has a beautiful server&client and ect.

My main goal in fight4ever:Ultimate V.2 is to (a. Make a client for it and (b.Make it look different from allstar-scape It has been improved a BUNCH. Here are some features.

Red = Complete
Blue = Working On
Green = Needs updates
Purple = Not attempted

[size=15pt]Features[/size]
[b][*]
[ul]No Thread per client[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Fixed a lot of errors[/ul]

[*]
[ul]All working specs[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Cool working vengance[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Less Lag[/ul]

[*]
[ul]All Skills[/ul]

[*]
[ul]All needed commands[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Cp Manager[/ul]

[*]
[ul]All items on client[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Fixing Prayer[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Eating without weapon[/ul]

[*]
[ul]New home + Train[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Fun godwars[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Fun Jad Mini (with firecape boolean)[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Giving Owner More Power/Controll over server[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Fixed ranging[/ul]

[*]
[ul]a second parseincomingpacket[/ul]

[*]
[ul]AutoCast[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Lunar[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Challenging Economy[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Hard Train[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Rares are actually RARE[/ul]

[*]
[ul]100% working Report System[/ul]

[*]
[ul]Clanchat[/ul]
[/b]

I will add more logs as i go, updated every 1 or 2 days.

November 3[sup]rd[/sup]
Im am still looking for a way to fix paryer and eating without weapon, if anyone has a way please tell me, ill be really happy (lol)

November 5[sup]th[/sup]
Today I restructered the Whole server, added godwars, added a easy menu adder and a lot more things. The only new problem i have is A “Orphaned Case” If you can help me that would be great! http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,317923.0.html

November 7[sup]th[/sup]
What a day!!! I got: Eating without weapon (W000t!!!) I got godwars!!! (Still needs Npc’s) There is still a few things bugging me. 1. Prayer. i just can’t find how to fix it. 2. Im trying to get auto-cast… :rolleyes:. Idc about that one… but still im sooooooooooo happy about getting the eating without weapon done, YAY!!!

November 8[sup]th[/sup]
parseincomingpacket!!! OMG!!! I can’t add a thing without getting a error ‘to big blah blah blah’ So i went ahead and added a second parseincomingpacket!!! (It actually works :eek:) So my server will barley ever get that error again.

December 17[sup]th[/sup]
Very close to being done, This Saturday is the first day im going to release the server. I promised all my players that no matter what it would be done on Saturday. It is going to take about another month, (Maybe ill finish on my birthday) So I just added Prayer, I don’t know if it works, after that it’s autocast.

Edit: I just got Auto-cast done too, i’m on a roll!!!

December 18[sup]th[/sup]
I have added Clanchat, Report system, “yellmute”, now all that is left is to make the economy and home.

Read full topic
